attributes.action: Close all schools in the uk (many already have covid 19 spreading)
attributes.additional_details: Many schools have no social distancing and my fellow students all have covid 19 and still go school. Teachers are also slowly not going in to teach aswell
attributes.background: Many schools have no social distancing and my fellow students all have covid 19 and still go school. Teachers are also slowly not going in to teach aswell

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Keep schools closed until Covid 19 is no longer a threat: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316404

Halt the reopening of schools until the NEU's 5 tests are met: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321101

Keep schools closed in the UK until an effective Cov-19 vaccine is available: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319292  

Delay opening of schools until Test Track and Trace for Covid 19 is working: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320891
